scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.doc: npm run doc:typedoc && npm run doc:client && npm run doc:server
scripts.doc:client: mkdir -p ./docs/graphs-client && npm run doc:madge:client && npm run doc:dc:client && npm run doc:dc:external:client
scripts.doc:server: mkdir -p ./docs/graphs-server && npm run doc:madge:server && npm run doc:dc:server && npm run doc:dc:external:server
scripts.doc:dc:client: npx depcruise client --include-only '^client' --output-type dot | dot -T svg > docs/graphs-client/dc-graph-client.svg
scripts.doc:dc:server: npx depcruise server --include-only '^server' --output-type dot | dot -T svg > docs/graphs-server/dc-graph-server.svg
scripts.doc:dc:external:client: npx depcruise client --output-type dot | dot -T svg > docs/graphs-client/dc-ext-graph-client.svg
scripts.doc:dc:external:server: npx depcruise server --output-type dot | dot -T svg > docs/graphs-server/dc-ext-graph-server.svg
scripts.clean: npm run clean:modules && npm run clean:doc && npm run clean:dist
